description:
Momonosuke, Kin’emon, and Yamato look back on the Land of Wano after Kaido and Orochi were taken down. They talk about the things that happened in the country after the raid on Onigashima and how Momonosuke worked hard to become a great Shogun.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: A Very Special Feature! Momonosuke`s Road to Becoming a Great Shogun
Dai Tokshuu! Momonosuke no Mei Shougun e no Michi
Große Zusammenfassung! – Momonosukes Weg zu einem berühmten Shogun
Épisode spécial. Momonosuké, le futur grand shogun !
大特集! モモの助の名将軍への道
